metadata.name: Renamed Visual Studio Code Tunnel Execution
metadata.comment: Detects renamed Visual Studio Code tunnel execution. Attackers can abuse this functionality to establish a C2 channel

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND ((process.file.name is null AND endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.exe tunnel')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.exe tunnel')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('--name ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('--accept-server-license-terms')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('tunnel ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('service')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('internal-run')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('tunnel-service.log'))) AND NOT (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\code-tunnel.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\code.exe'))) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower(' tunnel')) AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\cmd.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/d /c ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\servers\\stable-')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('code-server.cmd')) AND NOT (endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\code-tunnel.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\code.exe')))))

output.summary: Detects renamed Visual Studio Code tunnel execution. Attackers can abuse this functionality to establish a C2 channel
